duties_responsibilities.duty: Work closely with the sales teams to analyze customer P&Ls and new opportunity profitability.
Prepare revenue forecasts by customer supported with fact-based data driven insights.
Analyze customer performance, drive conversations with the sales team on profitable growth, and recommend action plans.
Oversee the month-end close process for the LATAM market, including trade and marketing accruals.
Be an advocate for process improvement, implementing automation where possible and maintaining integrity of customer master data.

education_certification.credential: BA in Accounting/Finance or related field (MBA and/or CPA/CA is a plus)
